response.overview: When he is 10, he wonders innocently, if he could ride the turtles, eat them or keep them inside a small jar. When he is 30, he could tell a distant turtle in the dark of the night just by a hint of movement on the sand, and the season of arrival just by the direction of the wind. When he is 50, he knows turtles like no one ever could and set an example of selfless service to nature. A curious child, a passionate protector, and an inspiring father- all of them live and walk the coasts of Odisha as one in 'Bipro'! Bred by the seas, 'Bipro' is an innate bond with the wise creatures of the wild waters that swirls through three human generations.
response.tagline: A conservation legacy in the making.
response.title: BIPRO
